name: J'up Beta version
description:
A simple endless game where the goal is to catch the most apples  withoout dying.

Power ups 

Red apple:Collect 10 to gain 1 life.

Green apple:Collect to upgrade your jump power.

Yellow apple :Colect to gain speed.

Clock:Colect to put the game in slo-mo.

Limited event

2.00$ for 1st

1.00$for 2nd

0.50$for 3rd 

Start :2023-02-10

Ends :2023-02-15
